data.title: Brasileirão Série B table, schedule & stats
data.meta_description: Check here Brasileirão Série B results, fixtures, table and all relevant stats, from this season and all previous seasons.
data.text:
Brasileirão Série B is a professional football league in Brazil.

There are overall 20 teams that compete for the title every year.

Sofascore tracks live football scores and Brasileirão Série B table, results, statistics and top scorers.

The teams are placed in 3 tables, with a promotion and relegation system for the best and worst-performing teams. 4 teams are relegated to the Brasileirão Série C.

The top scorers in the last season of Brasileirão Série B Brasileiro Série B 2023 season were Gabriel Poveda.Last season top scorer is Gabriel Poveda with 19 goals.

The average attendance per game was 10403.

The highest attendance per game in the season Brasileiro Série B 2023 was 58659.This was during the match between Vasco da Gama and Cruzeiro.

The total attendance in Brasileiro Série B 2023 season was 3923703.

The largest TV partners for Brasileirão Série B are Band, SportTV, Premiere.

The team with the largest stadium is Vasco da Gama with the capacity of 78838.

Who won the first Brasileirão Série B?

Villa Nova won the first Brasileirão Série B.

Which team is the current titleholder in Brasileirão Série B?

The current titleholder in Brasileirão Série B is Vitória.

What rank of competition is Brasileirão Série B in Brazil?

Brasileirão Série B is professional division in Brazil.

How many goals are scored on average in Brasileirão Série B in Brasileiro Serie B 2024?

The average number of goals in Brasileirão Série B is 2.09.

When does the Brasileirão Série B start and when does it finish?

The Brasileirão Série B usually starts in April and ends in November.

How many groups are there in Brasileirão Série B competition?

The teams in Brasileirão Série B are placed in 3 groups.
